getLabel

public String getLabel(String lang)
Gets the label of this item group. The catalog default language will be used if language code is not provided.

Parameters:
lang - The language code
Returns:
The item group label.

getTargetType

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer getTargetType()
Gets the target type (i.e. by relationship or association type) of this item group

Returns:
The target type. The return values are as follows: 1: by relation. -1: by association. 0: target type not set because item group is still empty.
